We expect you to:

  • Be active on gitter.
  • Blog at least once per week (this will be aggregated on blog.coala.io).
  • Participate in weekly meetings with your mentor.
  • Review PRs of other students and contributors. This is a big part of open source work and weâ€™ll make sure to help you get started.
  • All code you want to merge has to have full test coverage and documentation.
  • If anything, for whatever reason, looks to be problematic, talk to your mentor or an admin!

And Again: Get in contact with your mentors or the admins if any even remotely potential problems arise!
